snippet: NBC’s delayed coverage of the Olympic Games may be annoying, but there was nothing more spectacular than seeing Michael Phelps shatter a 48-year-old record by winning his 19th medal.
abstract: Editorial congratulates swimmer Michael Phelps, who has surpassed gymnast Larisa Latynina's record for winning the most Olympic medals in history; contends Phelps' triumph is an example of true Olympic glory, in contrast to the drama NBC seemed to be spinning about Phelps in its minidocumentaries, that of a hero facing a letdown in London.
lead_paragraph: NBC’s delayed coverage of the Olympic Games may be annoying, but there was nothing more spectacular than seeing Michael Phelps shatter a 48-year-old record by winning his 19th medal.
